data.sentence: The word وَهُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word فَقَالَ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: to company, associate, be the friend of or companion to. saahibun (pl. sahbuun and ashaabun) - companion, associate, possessor of any quality or thing, one in an intimate relation with anything, fellow and showing any type of connection or link, helper. saahibatun - spouse, consort, wife. saahaba - to bear company. ashaba (vb. 4) -to preserve, hinder, keep from, defend from. yushabuun - they will be accompanied.
data.sentence: The word لِصَاحِبِهِ comes from the root ص ح ب and is associated with the meanings: to company, associate, be the friend of or companion to. saahibun (pl. sahbuun and ashaabun) - companion, associate, possessor of any quality or thing, one in an intimate relation with anything, fellow and showing any type of connection or link, helper. saahibatun - spouse, consort, wife. saahaba - to bear company. ashaba (vb. 4) -to preserve, hinder, keep from, defend from. yushabuun - they will be accompanied.

data.meanings: To be abundant in weath, possess an abundance of property.

data.meanings: To surpass in number or quantity, increase, multiply, happen often; To be much, many, numerous.
data.sentence: The word أَكْثَرُ comes from the root ك ث ر and is associated with the meanings: To surpass in number or quantity, increase, multiply, happen often; To be much, many, numerous.

data.meanings: to bear fruit, fructify, get rich, increase. thamar - fruit, wealth, possession, profit, income.
data.sentence: The word ثَمَرٌ comes from the root ث م ر and is associated with the meanings: to bear fruit, fructify, get rich, increase. thamar - fruit, wealth, possession, profit, income.

data.meanings: (Ha-Alif-Ra) return/recoil, change/convert from one state/condition to another, wash/whiten, make round, surround, compete/contend for glory/superiority, the white around the eye, intense whiteness of the white of the eye and intense blackness of the black (with fairness around)* not found in humans but attributed to them by way of comparison. *likened to the eyes of gazelles/cows/bulls.One who whitens clothes/garments by washing them, hence applied to the disciples/apostles/companions of Jesus (see "hawariyyun" in 3:52, 5:111, 5:112, 61:14) because their trade was apparently to do this. Or it is applied to one bearing the following significations: one who is freed and cleared of every vice, fault or defect, one who has been tried and proved time after time and found to be free of vices, faults or defects. A thing pure. One who advises/counsels or acts sincerely/honestly/faithfully, friend/assistant, fair woman/man.
data.sentence: The word يُحَاوِرُهُ comes from the root ح و ر and is associated with the meanings: (Ha-Alif-Ra) return/recoil, change/convert from one state/condition to another, wash/whiten, make round, surround, compete/contend for glory/superiority, the white around the eye, intense whiteness of the white of the eye and intense blackness of the black (with fairness around)* not found in humans but attributed to them by way of comparison. *likened to the eyes of gazelles/cows/bulls.One who whitens clothes/garments by washing them, hence applied to the disciples/apostles/companions of Jesus (see "hawariyyun" in 3:52, 5:111, 5:112, 61:14) because their trade was apparently to do this. Or it is applied to one bearing the following significations: one who is freed and cleared of every vice, fault or defect, one who has been tried and proved time after time and found to be free of vices, faults or defects. A thing pure. One who advises/counsels or acts sincerely/honestly/faithfully, friend/assistant, fair woman/man.

data.meanings: mighty/potent/powerful/strong, noble/honourable/glorious, resisted/withstood, invincible, overcome (e.g. in argument), exalt, prevail, highly esteemed, precious, glory, vanity, excellent, proud and hard manner, stern.. uzza - name of an idol of the pagan Arabs regarded by them as God's daughter.. . 'Azza (prf. 3rd. m. sing. asim. V): Prevailed.. 'Azzaznaa (prf. 1st. pl. II): We strengthened.. Tu'izzu (impf. 2nd. m. pl. II): thou honour, confer honour and dignity.. 'Izzan (v. n.): source of strength.. 'Izzatun (v. n.): vain pride, false prestige or sense of self respect, might honour, power.. Al-Aziizun (act. pic. m. sing.): All-Mighty, One of the names of Allah, Unassailable, invincible, powerful in evidences and arguments, strong, mighty, heavy (with 'alaa: tell hard upon).. A'azzu (elative): more powerful, that occupies stronger and more respectable position.. A'izzatan (n. pl.): most respectable and powerful, its sing. is 'Aziiyun.
data.sentence: The word وَأَعَزُّ comes from the root ع ز ز and is associated with the meanings: mighty/potent/powerful/strong, noble/honourable/glorious, resisted/withstood, invincible, overcome (e.g. in argument), exalt, prevail, highly esteemed, precious, glory, vanity, excellent, proud and hard manner, stern.. uzza - name of an idol of the pagan Arabs regarded by them as God's daughter.. . 'Azza (prf. 3rd. m. sing. asim. V): Prevailed.. 'Azzaznaa (prf. 1st. pl. II): We strengthened.. Tu'izzu (impf. 2nd. m. pl. II): thou honour, confer honour and dignity.. 'Izzan (v. n.): source of strength.. 'Izzatun (v. n.): vain pride, false prestige or sense of self respect, might honour, power.. Al-Aziizun (act. pic. m. sing.): All-Mighty, One of the names of Allah, Unassailable, invincible, powerful in evidences and arguments, strong, mighty, heavy (with 'alaa: tell hard upon).. A'azzu (elative): more powerful, that occupies stronger and more respectable position.. A'izzatan (n. pl.): most respectable and powerful, its sing. is 'Aziiyun.

data.meanings: to run away from fight, go forth from any business (as from war), march, grow wild, restive.
data.sentence: The word نَفَرًا comes from the root ن ف ر and is associated with the meanings: to run away from fight, go forth from any business (as from war), march, grow wild, restive.
